title: Enhancing Learning Design Practical Skills: Online Beauty Vocational Training for Health and Beauty Consultants

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can accurately identify five or more skin types through skin analysis simulations.
Learners can apply management methods tailored to three or more scalp types through VR-based hair care practice.
Learners can demonstrate eight employment competencies required in the beauty industry (e.g., customer communication, problem-solving) by creating a digital portfolio.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
